description:
Frontback is a fun new camera app that let’s you capture and share what you see and how you feel at any moment. With Frontback, you can take a photo with the front and back camera and share it in a single image. 

Like the world, all photos are posted in real time. Use our explore feeds to see the world, now. 

Grow your community by following friends or interesting people and sharing moments with them. Frontback React lets you leave a photo or 5 second video reaction to a friend’s Frontback photo. Interact with your community today! 

Frontback was recently selected by Apple as one of their “Best New Apps!” Other publications that have featured Frontback are CNN, The New York Times, ELLE, Business Insider, The Verge, Re/code, and Bloomberg TV.

App Features
— Capture moments using the front and back camera
— Share photos instantly via SMS, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, email, and more.
— Explore recent, popular, nearby, staff picks and trends with our live photo feeds 
— Follow friends, family or other community members 
— Frontback React: Interact with friends by posting a photo or 5 second video reaction 

Need help? Contact us at support@frontback.me 

Help us translate Frontback for your language, email us at: translations@frontback.me
releaseNotes:
- support for 64-bit devices... meaning Frontback is now faster than ever!
- improved reporting tools
- location and bug fixes

New in 2.0        
Ladies and Gentlemen! Today, we give you.. Drumroll please! 

Frontback REACT: leave a photo or 5 second video reaction to a friend’s Frontback. It’s a commenting system redefined. 

Reactions can be: 
— Photo or 5 second video
— Public or private
— Attached to a location 
— Captioned or caption-less 
— Made using the front or back camera

You’ll also find this update includes: 
— Offline Mode: post Frontbacks without service!
— Bug Fixes
— Belgian Waffles

Have questions or suggestions? Please reach us at support@frontback.me or tweet at @frontbackapp 

Help us translate Frontback for your language, email us at: translations@frontback.me
